content.subtitle: NovaLogic strikes a nice balance between simulation and action. But can they include the fun?

content.title: Armorines: Project S.W.A.R.M
content.subtitle: Shoot bug.  Run.  Repeat.  How long, o Lord, how long?

content.title: Armorines: Project S.W.A.R.M.
content.subtitle: It's time to stomp some icky alien bugs in Acclaim's action title for the Game Boy Color.

content.title: Armorines: Project S.W.A.R.M.
content.subtitle: Starship Troopers meets the Turok 2 engine and all hell breaks loose. The full review.

content.title: Arms Review
content.subtitle: Nintendo's new fighting game proves that with wacky appendages, clever boxing is within reach.

content.title: Army Corps of Hell Review
content.subtitle: Go to Hell.

content.title: Army Men
content.subtitle: Plastic toy soldiers make the move to the PC screen... but is it worth the effort?

content.title: Army Men
content.subtitle: Those little plastic men get even smaller on the Game Boy Color, but it's a great big adventure.

content.title: Army Men 2
content.subtitle: A lot's been added but nothing's been fixed.

content.title: Army Men 2
content.subtitle: 3DO's biggest namesake is back in portable form on the Game Boy Color, as good as it ever was.

content.title: Army Men 3D
content.subtitle: 3DO's plastic quick study in decent gameplay and licensing strategy is unfortunately not a keeper.

content.title: Army Men Advance
content.subtitle: 3DO's plastic heroes hit the screen in a better-than-expected action title for the Game Boy Advance.

content.title: Army Men: Air Attack
content.subtitle: Tiny plastic men take to the air in a fast-moving, arcade shooter that's serious two-player fun.

content.title: Army Men: Air Attack 2
content.subtitle: It's prettier, cleaner, it's got more polygons, and it's fun, but where can Air Attack go from here?

names.name: Army Men: Air Attack 2
alt: Army Men: Air Attack -- Blade's Revenge

content.title: Army Men: Air Attack 2
content.subtitle: Air Attack has proven once again that it's the crown jewel of 3DO's top-selling Army Men series.

names.name: Army Men: Air Attack 2
alt: Army Men: Air Attack -- Blade's Revenge

content.title: Army Men Air Combat
content.subtitle: 3DO continues its biggest license on the Game Boy Color with a game you may have played before...
